text: They'll be there for you. ( Photo : Gregg DeGuire / WireImage and Jason Merritt / Getty Images ) Jennifer Aniston ’ s hubby, Justin Theroux, and her bestie, Courteney Cox, have been Team Aniston cheerleaders this week, doing their part to keep their girl out of the Brangelina split narrative. “ I feel like we ’ re exacerbating it by even talking about it, ” Aniston ’ s forever Friend and former co - star told Entertainment Tonight Tuesday while at the Chateau Marmont for Revlon ’ s Annual Philanthropic Luncheon. “ It ’ s not about her. ” We tend to agree, since Aniston and Brad Pitt divorced 11 years ago.
